author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Southern Railway will be operating a special train from Kochuveli to Guwahati via Chennai to clear the extra rush of passengers. The train (no. 06336) will leave Kochuveli at noon on April 3, 10, 17 and 24 (all Sundays) and reach Guwahati at 8 a.m. on Wednesdays.

Advance reservations will commerce on Wednesday. —Staff Reporter
title: Special trains to Guwahati
